name: mapsspw

stmt.origin: sstri(co(c0, cmap, c1), cpw(cxp(c1, c0)), co(c0, cpm, c1))

body.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), cpw(cxp(c1, c0)))
-| wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1))
-| wss(co(c0, cpm, c1), cpw(cxp(c1, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), cpw(cxp(c1, c0)))
-| wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1))
-| wss(co(c0, cpm, c1), cpw(cxp(c1, c0)))

body.origin: |- wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c0, cpm, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, cmap, c1), cpw(cxp(c1, c0)))
-| wss(co(c0, cpm, c1), cpw(cxp(c1, c0)))

comment: Set exponentiation is a subset of the power set of the Cartesian product of its arguments. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
